// Create a PollyClient
$client = new Aws\Polly\PollyClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'version' => '2016-06-10',
    'region' => 'us-east-2'
]);


try {
    $result = $client->listLexicons([]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage();
    echo "\n";
}
